text: Carola Mangiarotti (born 2 May 1952) is an Italian fencer. The daughter of fencer Edoardo Mangiarotti, she competed at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Fencers from Milan Category:Italian female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Italy Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Mangiarotti family
title: Carola Mangiarotti
